divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching an approaching storm when object came from the north heading south it was hovering like it was observing the storm it was amber colored and it looked like the color pulsed. It went into a cloud bank and Came back out and ho vered then started to . head south then stopped then it took off so fast it was faster then anything ive ever seen and it made absolutely no noise what so ever.
